DOC.brief_title: PHASES : Provision HIV Treatment ATN Sites : An Evaluation Stakeholders
DOC.detailed_description: This observational study involve retrospective prospective medical record review cover total maximum 104 week ( 24 month ) per subject . Behavioral data collect via ACASI study entry ass demographic psychosocial variable study subject . All data ( biomedical , ART , healthcare utilization ) subsequent study visit collect via medical record abstraction . Information miss visit well healthcare utilization data abstract electronic appointment system electronic system clinical site . Subject data abstract medical record maximum 26 week prior baseline study visit , well maximum 78 week baseline study visit January 31 , 2017 , whichever occur first , total maximum 104 week two year per subject . Data also collect Adolescent Medicine Trials Unit assess clinic level variable baseline ( within 30 day protocol registration ) 48 96 week baseline . Definitions engagement , prescription antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) , viral suppression Continuum Care ( CoC ) utilize common definition include U.S. Department Health Human Services ( DHHS ) Health Resources Services Administration ( HRSA ) HIV/AIDS Bureau ( HAB ) . Data collect large , simple trial design manner provide element primary secondary outcome .
DOC.criteria: Laboratory evidence HIV1 infection per Centers Disease Control Prevention ( CDC ) Surveillance Case Definition HIV Infection , 2014 ( Section 1.1 ) http : //www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/rr6303a1.htm ; Behaviorallyacquired HIV age 9 year ; Age 13 24 year , inclusive , baseline visit ( Enrollment ) ; Planning receive HIV medical care AMTU clinical site part AMTU duration study followup â€¢ If transition adult health care provider must occur course study participation , continue AMTU staff accessibility medical appointment record ; Ability AMTU staff access medical appointment record maximum 78 week enrollment February 2017 , whichever occur first ; Ability understand spoken English ; Willing able provide sign informed consent assent ; NOTE : If consent/assent obtain > 4 week prior enrollment date , reaffirmation consent must obtain prior start Baseline visit . Parent Legal Guardian permission , applicable ; In addition criterion list , consider eligible enrollment August 31 , 2015 , individual must also meet follow criterion . Must consider either : ( ) newly engage HIV medical care define previous initial comprehensive HIV medical care visit consent occur , time , within four week follow initial comprehensive visit ; ( b ) newly reengaged HIV medical care define attend last medical appointment 52 week ago . *NOTE : The initial HIV medical care appointment define routine HIV medical appointment adolescent attend medical provider authorize prescribe medication . This HIV medical appointment must nonemergency , routine conditionfocused exam AND one following : CD4 , VL lab draw and/or review lab result ; Discussion around HIV ART option ; Primary and/or secondary HIV prevention education counseling ; Diagnosis treatment complication HIV , AIDSdefining condition . Presence serious psychiatric symptom ( e.g. , active hallucination , think disorder ) would impair individual 's ability provide true informed consent participate baseline ACASI* ; Visibly distraught ( e.g. , suicidal , homicidal , exhibit violent behavior ) time consent baseline ACASI* ; Intoxicated influence alcohol substance time consent baseline ACASI* NOTE : If consent/assent obtain prior enrollment date , assessment exclusion criterion must perform prior administration baseline ACASI ( Enrollment ) . If present , subject enrol ; administer ACASI . Reassessment eligibility enrollment may take place later date per discretion treat clinician .
